Class MessengerServer

java.lang.Object
MessengerServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class MessengerServer extends Object implements Runnable
Server class running multiple threads (implements Runnable). Allows multiple clients to connect simultaneously while accessing and modifying shared data independent of the client's location.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Socket
    clientSocket
    The constant Socket connection with a client for a MessengerServer thread

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the interface between a thread of the server and a connected client.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Runs the server on a forever loop. Accepts client connections and creates and runs a thread for each connection
      Parameters:
      args - [UNUSED] Variable arguments
